value.name: labels
value.description: A list of labels that when detected will be sent to the post processor. Applies only to this specific camera.
Camera identifier. Valid characters are lowercase a-z, numbers and underscores.

value.name: cameras
value.description: Camera-specific configuration. All subordinate keys corresponds to the camera_identifier of a configured camera.

value.name: host
value.description: IP or hostname to your CompreFace server.

value.name: port
value.description: Port to your CompreFace server.

value.name: recognition_api_key
value.description: API key to your CompreFace recognition service.

value.name: labels
value.description: A list of labels that when detected will be sent to the post processor. Applies to all cameras defined under cameras.

value.name: face_recognition_path
value.description: Path to folder which contains subdirectories with images for each face to track.

value.name: save_unknown_faces
value.description: If true, any unrecognized face will be saved to the folder specified in unknown_faces_path. You can then move this image to the folder of the correct person to improve accuracy.

value.name: unknown_faces_path
value.description: Path to folder where unknown faces will be stored.

value.name: expire_after
value.description: Time in seconds before a detected face is no longer considered detected.

value.name: detect_remote_faces
value.description: If true, faces trained using other methods will be detected.

value.name: train
value.description: Train CompreFace to recognize faces on Viseron start. Disable this when you have a good model trained.

value.name: det_prob_threshold
value.description: Minimum required confidence that a recognized face is actually a face.

value.name: similarity_threshold
value.description: CompreFace does not return unknown for faces that it does not recognize. If you upload the faces of two different people, you still receive the result, but the similarity is low. Any similarity below this threshold will be considered as an unknown face.

value.name: limit
value.description: Maximum number of faces on the image to be recognized. It recognizes the biggest faces first. Value of 0 represents no limit.

value.name: prediction_count
value.description: Maximum number of subject predictions per face. It returns the most similar subjects.

value.name: face_plugins
value.description: Comma-separated slugs of face plugins. If empty, no additional information is returned. Learn more

value.name: status
value.description: If true includes system information like execution_time and plugin_version fields.

value.name: face_recognition
value.description: Face recognition domain config.
